publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6604 Kenny MacAskill: Criminal Justice and Licensing (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Criminal Justice and Licensing (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
S3M-6604 Kenny MacAskill: Criminal Justice and Licensing (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Criminal Justice and Licensing (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
